definition: medal table/tally of trophies/list of prizewinners

sentences.english: Chris Smalling's got his first medal, so have Darron Gibson and Chicharito.
sentences.chinese: 斯莫林得到了他的第一個獎牌，還有吉布森，豌豆。

sentences.english: He went on to win 12 medals in four Paralympic Games.
sentences.chinese: 此後，他先後參加了四屆殘奧會，贏得了12枚獎牌。

sentences.english: To be around the medalists was a great honour.
sentences.chinese: 能爲獲得獎牌而奮鬥本身就是一種莫大的榮譽。

sentences.english: Noble and elegant, the medals are a blending of traditional Chinese culture and Olympism.
sentences.chinese: 高貴而典雅，獎牌是中國傳統文化和奧林匹克的融合。

sentences.english: The native designs were laser-engraved on each medal.
sentences.chinese: 這些自主設計是用激光雕刻在每一枚獎牌上的。

sentences.english: Britain was No. 2 with 42 gold and 102 overall.
sentences.chinese: 第二名是英國收穫42金共計102枚獎牌。

sentences.english: Your state of motion, giving you the mileage awarded medals.
sentences.chinese: 你的運動狀態，讓您的里程頒發了獎牌。

sentences.english: The medals will go into production later this year at Royal Mint's headquarters in Llantrisant, South Wales.
sentences.chinese: 今年晚些時候，皇家鑄幣局就將開始製作獎牌。

sentences.english: Our team got creamed in the semi-finals so we din’t win a trophy.
sentences.chinese: 我們隊在幾個半決賽中遭受重挫，沒有贏到獎牌。

sentences.english: "I don't care about this medal. I wanted gold," Abrahamian said, adding that he would retire from the sport.
sentences.chinese: “我不在乎這塊獎牌，我要的是金牌，”他憤言道。

sentences.english: In Sydney Paraplegic Olympics, he won a medal in archery.
sentences.chinese: 在悉尼殘疾人奧運會上，他贏得了箭術比賽的獎牌。

sentences.english: Organization Awards winners will be given certificates and medals.
sentences.chinese: 組織獎頒發證書和獎牌。

sentences.english: For the richest, brawniest countries here, the medal count is all that counts.
sentences.chinese: 對那些富裕強大的國家來說，獎牌數最重要。

sentences.english: And he won like seven medals in Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 他在北京好像贏了七塊獎牌。

sentences.english: Hopefully our team will win the game and win a medal.
sentences.chinese: 我們隊有希望贏得這場比賽並得塊獎牌。

sentences.english: British hopes of a medal rested on Ovett.
sentences.chinese: 英國把獲得獎牌的希望寄託在奧維特的身上。

definition: bronze medal/bronze plaque bearing a business name or logo etc/CL:枚[mei2]
to compete/to take part in a competition
special glory/distinction/rare honor/one's laurels/it's a privilege (to meet you)
